ygData.subject: Re: Question about skill advancement.
ygData.msgSnippet: Depends on where you turn them in.  I found there is another person you can turn them into behind the Arena that raises your faction with the KnightsofTruth
ygData.messageBody:
Depends on where you turn them in. I found there is another person
you can turn them into behind the Arena that raises your faction
with the KnightsofTruth and lowers your faction with the CorruptFreeport
Guards.



> ----------
> From: Tom Swift[SMTP:tswift@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 2:19 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Question about skill advancement.
>
> From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>
> You may not have noticed but turning in slashed belts LOWERS your faction
> with the paladins and priests of marr
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Taylor <john.taylor@...>
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com' <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 3:15 PM
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Question about skill advancement.
>
>
> From: John Taylor <john.taylor@...>
>
> But the act of killing the orcs of get the belts ups your faction with the
> Paladins, so it matches or goes up faster than it drops doing the belt
> quest.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tom Swift [mailto:tswift@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 12:11 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Question about skill advancement.
>
>
>
> I am Bael, a warrior of the 15th Order and a dark elf. At the start of
> this
> level I put 20 points each into dual wield and double attack. I am a
> little
> over a bubble away from 16 and my skills are now 65 for dual wield and 72
> for double attack. My rate of advancement has slowed considerably, I am
> wondering if I should expect to max these at 80 before I hit 16 or if that
> is uncommon.
>
> If I can max them I will likely get myself killed right before i level up
> in
> order to buy some more time at 15.
>
> By the way I am using a combine scimitar and tentacle whip against magical
> opponents and dual mino axes against non-magical opponents. My max damage
> per round is 79, that is double attacks on both weapons with max
> damage(17)
> and a max damage kick (11).
>
> And in reference to others questions about faction. It is easy enough to
> gain enough faction for the Commonlands vendors to deal with you, just
> kill
> orcs by the dozens. I kill every orc I see, pawns, centurions and so on.
> You can get Freeport residents to deal with you by completing the orc
> slashed belt quest repeatedly. If you do that tho you faction with the
> Paladins in North Freeport will get worse. It is up to you whether West
> and
> east freeport are more important to you then North Freeport
>
> Bael
> 15th Order
> Indigo Brotherhood
>
>
